member.name: T:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.DbConnectionScopeAttribute
member.summary: Custom attribute that will create a DbConnectionScope for the attributed method. The default option, if not specified, is Required.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.entryLevel
member.summary: Level of messages logged when a method is entered.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.entryText
member.summary: Message to log when a method is entered.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.exitLevel
member.summary: Level of messages logged when a method is exited normally (i.e. without throwing exception).

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.exitText
member.summary: Message to log when a method is exited normally (i.e. without throwing exception).

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.exceptionLevel
member.summary: Level of messages logged when an exception is thrown from a method.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.exceptionText
member.summary: Message to log when an exception is thrown from a method.

member.name: P:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.EntryLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the level of messages logged when a method is entered.

remarks.para: Default value of this proprerty is .

member.name: P:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.EntryText
member.summary: Gets or sets the message to log when a method is entered.

remarks.para: Default value of this proprerty is the following string: "Entering method: {signature}.".
Please refer to the class documentation for more information.

member.name: P:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.ExitLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the level of messages logged when a method is exited normally (i.e. without throwing exception).

remarks.para: Default value of this proprerty is .

member.name: P:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.ExitText
member.summary: Gets or sets the message to log when a method is exited normally (i.e. without throwing exception).

remarks.para: Default value of this proprerty is the following string: "Exiting method: {signature}.".
Please refer to the class documentation for more information.

member.name: P:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.ExceptionLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the level of messages logged when an exception is thrown from a method.

remarks.para: Default value of this proprerty is .

member.name: P:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.Log4NetTraceAttribute.ExceptionText
member.summary: Gets or sets the message to log when an exception is thrown from a method.

remarks.para: Default value of this proprerty is the following string: "Exception thrown from method: {signature}.".
Please refer to the class documentation for more information.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Message to log when a method is entered.

member.name: T:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.LogLevel
member.summary: Specifies severity level of a logged message.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.LogLevel.None
member.summary: No message should be logged.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.LogLevel.Debug
member.summary: Message should be logged using Debug() method.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.LogLevel.Info
member.summary: Message should be logged using Info() method.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.LogLevel.Warn
member.summary: Message should be logged using Warn() method.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.LogLevel.Error
member.summary: Message should be logged using Error() method.

member.name: F:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.LogLevel.Fatal
member.summary: Message should be logged using Fatal() method.

member.name: M:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.PerformanceCounterIncrementAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Attribute to indicate a method invocation is used to modify a performance counter. This constructor create an instance that will increment the performance counter by one each time the decorated method is called.

member.name: M:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.PerformanceCounterIncrementAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Attribute to indicate a method invocation is used to modify a performance counter. This constructor create an instance that will increment the performance counter by one each time the decorated method is called.

member.name: M:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.PerformanceCounterResponseTimeAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Attribute to indicate a method invocation is used to modify a performance counter. This constructor create an instance that will maintain a counter for the average response time of the method decorated.

member.name: M:Spring2.Core.PostSharp.PerformanceCounterResponseTimeAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Attribute to indicate a method invocation is used to modify a performance counter. This constructor create an instance that will maintain a counter for the average response time of the method decorated.
